document_data.name: Bokkum
document_data.mainbody:
'''Bokkum''' was a dwarf and a travelling companion of [[Tred McKnuckles]]. He had a brother named [[Stokkum]]. He was killed in [[1370 DR]] when a band of [[orc]]s and [[frost giant]]s attacked the caravan in which he was travelling.


{{stub-person}}
